title: Tea market : major importing countries worldwide 2018
yAxis: Trade value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Trade value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Trade value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Pakistan and lowest at Country Canada.
The highest Country Pakistan has 425.78 more Trade value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Canada.
